publications.title: Maximizing aerial detection of organic objects in non-exhaustively searchable survey area
publications.authors: A Niaraki, J Herrera-Gerena, J Roghair, A Jannesari
publications.venue: Proceedings of the Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Conference
publications.description: A comprehensive study on optimizing aerial object detection in large-scale survey areas using reinforcement learning and computer vision techniques for agricultural monitoring applications.

publications.title: AUTOMATIC UMPIRING SYSTEM
publications.authors: Jay L. Guild, Amir Niaraki, Andrew J. Schembs, Alireza Razavi
publications.description: An automated system for sports officiating using computer vision and machine learning algorithms to assist in decision-making during athletic competitions.

publications.title: Capacitance of Flexible Polymer/Graphene Microstructures with High Mechanical Strength
publications.authors: V Nasirian, AE Niaraki-Asli, SS Aykar, M Taghavimehr, R Montazami
publications.description: Investigation of electrical properties and mechanical strength of flexible polymer-graphene composite microstructures fabricated using 3D printing techniques for flexible electronics applications.

publications.title: Energy-aware 3D path planning via Reinforcement Learning for aerial object detection and mapping
publications.description: PhD dissertation focusing on developing energy-efficient path planning algorithms for unmanned aerial vehicles using reinforcement learning for autonomous object detection and environmental mapping.

publications.title: Electrochemical characterization of dopamine in neural cells with flexible biosensors
publications.authors: M Abbasi Shirsavar, A Niaraki, NN Hashemi
publications.venue: Journal of Manufacturing Science and Engineering
publications.description: Development of flexible biosensors for real-time electrochemical monitoring of dopamine release in neural cells, advancing our understanding of neural communication mechanisms.

publications.title: Minute-sensitive real-time monitoring of neural cells through printed graphene microelectrodes
publications.authors: A Niaraki, MA Shirsavar, SS Aykar, M Taghavimehr, R Montazami
publications.description: Novel graphene-based microelectrodes enabling high-resolution, real-time monitoring of neural cell activity with minute-level temporal precision for advanced neurobiological research.

publications.title: Fabrication of Conductive Hollow Microfibers for Encapsulation of Astrocyte Cells
publications.authors: N Alimoradi, V Nasirian, SS Aykar, MC McNamara, AE Niaraki-Asli
publications.description: Development of conductive hollow microfibers for three-dimensional encapsulation and electrical stimulation of astrocyte cells, advancing tissue engineering applications in neuroscience.

publications.title: Graphene microelectrodes for real-time impedance spectroscopy of neural cells
publications.authors: A Niaraki, MC McNamara, R Montazami, NN Hashemi
publications.description: Implementation of graphene-based microelectrodes for real-time impedance spectroscopy, enabling non-invasive monitoring of neural cell behavior and viability in vitro.

publications.title: Behavior of Neural Cells Post Manufacturing and After Prolonged Encapsulation within Conductive Graphene-Laden Alginate Microfibers
publications.authors: MC McNamara, SS Aykar, N Alimoradi, AE Niaraki Asli, RL Pemathilaka
publications.description: Comprehensive study of neural cell viability and functionality within conductive alginate-graphene microfibers, establishing protocols for long-term cell encapsulation in bioelectronic devices.

publications.title: Visual Exploration and Energy-aware Path Planning via Reinforcement Learning
publications.authors: A Niaraki, J Roghair, A Jannesari
publications.description: Development of reinforcement learning algorithms for energy-efficient visual exploration and path planning in autonomous systems, with applications in robotics and unmanned aerial vehicles.

publications.title: Enhancing the Conductivity of Cell-Laden Alginate Microfibers with Aqueous Graphene for Neural Applications
publications.authors: MC McNamara, AE Niaraki Asli, J Guo, J Okuzono, R Montazami
publications.description: Innovative approach to enhance electrical conductivity of alginate microfibers through aqueous graphene integration, enabling improved neural cell stimulation and monitoring capabilities.

publications.title: High-Yield Production of Aqueous Graphene for Electrohydrodynamic Drop-on-Demand Printing of Biocompatible Conductive Patterns
publications.authors: AE Niaraki Asli, J Guo, PL Lai, R Montazami, NN Hashemi
publications.description: Development of high-yield aqueous graphene production methods for electrohydrodynamic printing of biocompatible conductive patterns, advancing flexible bioelectronic device fabrication.

publications.title: Viability of Neural Cells on 3D Printed Graphene Bioelectronics
publications.authors: AE Niaraki Asli, J Guo, KR Williams, PL Lai, X Wang, R Montazami
publications.description: Assessment of neural cell compatibility with 3D printed graphene-based bioelectronic devices, establishing foundational knowledge for neural interface technologies.

publications.title: Energy-aware goal selection and path planning of uav systems via reinforcement learning
publications.authors: A Niaraki, J Roghair, A Jannesari
publications.description: Early work on applying reinforcement learning to UAV path planning with energy constraints, laying the groundwork for autonomous aerial systems optimization.

publications.title: Combustion of syngas in intersecting burners using the interferometry method
publications.authors: M Kiani, E Houshfar, AE Niaraki Asli, M Ashjaee
publications.description: Experimental investigation of syngas combustion characteristics using interferometry techniques, contributing to clean energy research and combustion optimization.
